titleText: Google Wallet Expands with 'Everything Else' Pass Feature
mainText: Google Wallet is rolling out a new 'Everything Else' feature, allowing users to create digital passes for a variety of items such as event tickets, gym memberships, and insurance cards. This new feature replaces the previous 'Photo' option and utilizes AI to suggest and classify pass content. Private and sensitive information is kept secure and requires authentication. Currently, this feature is available only in the US. For more details, visit the full article [here](https://9to5google.com/2024/08/12/google-wallet-everything-else/).
